title: Priyanka Chopra
summary: Priyanka Chopra Jonas (pronounced [prɪˈjəŋka ˈtʃoːpɽa],[1] born 18 July 1982) is an Indian actress, model, film producer, and singer. The winner of the Miss World 2000 pageant, Chopra is one of India's highest-paid and most popular entertainers. She has received numerous accolades, including two National Film Award and five Filmfare Awards. In 2016, the Government of India honoured her with the Padma Shri, and Time named her one of the 100 most influential people in the world, and in the next two years, Forbes listed her among the World's 100 Most Powerful Women.
